Purdue.description: Network segmentation model for industrial control systems (ICS/OT) with zone-based security controls
Purdue.note: Purdue controls are organized by network zones/levels rather than device platforms. Each level has a YAML catalog with detailed controls.

level-3.5.description: Buffer between enterprise IT (Level 4) and site operations/OT (Level 3). Primary security objectives: boundary protection, controlled data flow, monitoring, and remote access management.

traffic_tests.description: Traffic flow and zone boundary validation
